name: Ripto's Ranch
description:
Can a simple pixelated dinosaur that hand-rears prize winning conifers live in peace?

Nope!

The local fast-food joint has an outrageous deal on mozzarella dippers and "cheese freaks" are running through Ripto's Ranch destroying the prize winning conifers! With his trusty bone, Ripto, must knockout these "cheese freaks" before the conifers are crushed! 

Ripto's Ranch was created for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam. All the games components, controls, colours and sounds are all specifically for functioning on a Nokia 3310 mobile. Enjoy!
